p:
A diverse dataset holds a key premise for the identification of novel molecules via screening methods when compared to a similar‐sized combinatorial library with limited structural variation.
[35] To analyze the chemical space coverage of the EANPDB, PCA in comparison with the updated versions of NANPDB
[6c] and NuBBE
[5e] was performed and the findings are presented here. The molecular diversity of the NPs constituting the EANPDB, using PCA is illustrated with the 3D scatter plots in Figure 5.
